entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
